Item ID6627

White plateskirt is a piece of White Knight armour that requires the completion of the Wanted! quest and 10 Defence. As with all white armour, the white plateskirt cannot be made using the Smithing skill. One can obtain this piece of armour from Sir Vyvin (with the Page rank), or they can buy it from another player.

Compared to other armour, white plateskirts have the same stats as white platelegs but weigh less, and have the same stats and weight as a black plateskirt except that the white plateskirt gives an additional +1 Prayer bonus.

[[File:White plateskirt detail.png|120px|left]]
'''White plateskirt''' is a piece of [[White Knight armour]] that requires the completion of the [[Wanted!]] quest and 10 [[Defence]]. As with all white armour, the white plateskirt '''''cannot''''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill. One can obtain this piece of armour from Sir Vyvin (with the Page [[White Knight rank|rank]]), or they can buy it from another player.

Compared to other armour, white plateskirts have the same stats as [[white platelegs]] but weigh less, and have the same stats and weight as a [[black plateskirt]] except that the white plateskirt gives an additional +1 [[Prayer]] bonus.
